Hello! My name is Dan Isbell and I am an Assistant Professor in the [Department of Second Language Studies](https://www.hawaii.edu/sls/) at the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa. I completed my PhD in Second Language Studies at Michigan State University in 2019. I am an Associate Editor at *Language Learning* and serve on the Editorial Board of *Language Testing*.
